A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a huge Star Wars fan I speak. Nothing “Fresh” about this movie. Only “Rotten”. I’m really disappointed. This movie was complete garbage. Who cares what the “Professional Critics” say about the film. Everyone knows the audience score is what counts. Disney really messed up. This movie had the potential of being the greatest Star Wars movie of all time\, and they messed it up big time!
